thread.title: Showmanship Is Still the Star at Detroit Auto Show

author: Tim Higgins
title: Showmanship Is Still the Star at Detroit Auto Show
text:
The Detroit auto show has lost some of its luster as car makers increasingly flock to technology conferences, including the annual consumer electronics show CES, with product announcements and keynote speeches.
But there’s still life in the Motor City’s big event.
Among the glitzy introductions auto makers staged for new vehicles and concept...
